title: AI-powered Document Auto-tagging
description: Automatically generate tags and categories for uploaded documents using LLM-based analysis and topic modeling. Improves discoverability and organization of knowledge bases.

Integrate auto-tagging into new KB initialization flow and persist per-document results
Integrate auto-tagging into incremental upload processing for new documents and persist results
Expose KB-level tag/category summaries on the list/details API responses
Render KB tags/categories in Knowledge Bases UI (chips/summary)
